item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
At Riot Games, we are passionate about creating the best gaming experiences for players worldwide. From competitive titles to immersive storytelling, our games are built with a commitment to quality, innovation, and community. Our goal is to bring people together through play, fostering a culture of collaboration, competition, and creativity in everything we do.

Mission Statement
Our mission is to develop, publish, and support the most player-focused games in the world. We believe in creating experiences that resonate with players, where fun, challenge, and engagement come together to inspire millions. By putting players first, we strive to evolve and grow with our community.

Our Team

Vision Statement
Our vision is to build a global community of gamers who connect through shared passion and competition. We envision a future where gaming transcends boundaries, bringing together people from all walks of life to create a more inclusive, collaborative, and dynamic digital landscape.

MEET OUR TEAM

"Games have the power to connect, challenge, and inspire us to think creatively and work together."

Riot Games, believe in the transformative power of games. They bring people together from all corners of the world, offering challenges that spark creativity and inspire collaboration. Our mission is to create experiences that unite players, fostering a global community built on competition, fun, and shared passion.

Discover a world of possibilities

Welcome to a world of limitless possibilities, where the journey is as exhilarating as the destination, and As we navigate the intricate tapestry of existence, we are constantly presented with choices, each a potential pathway to something extraordinary. This is a world where creativity knows no bounds, where the curious mind finds solace, and where the fearless heart discovers uncharted territories.

item.title: Footer - Riot
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179

item.title: League of Legends
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
MOBA

The Ultimate Competitive MOBA Experience

League of Legends is a fast-paced, team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions battle to destroy the other’s base. With a rich pool of characters, dynamic gameplay, and constantly evolving strategies, it’s the go-to game for competitive and casual players alike.

Game Page

Diverse Champion Roster

Choose from over 150 unique champions, each with their own abilities and playstyles. Find your perfect match, whether you prefer dominating the battlefield as a damage dealer, supporting allies, or leading your team to victory.

Strategic Depth

From intricate team fights to split-second decision-making, League of Legends offers endless strategic opportunities. Master the map, adapt to your opponents, and outsmart them with clever tactics to secure the win.

Global Esports Phenomenon

Join millions of players worldwide in one of the biggest esports scenes ever. Experience thrilling tournaments, cheer for your favorite teams, and take your skills to the next level in a community that celebrates competition.

Unleash Your True Power

League of Legends’ champions are at the heart of the game. Each champion brings a distinct personality, unique abilities, and a role that shapes the way you play. Whether you want to charge into battle as a fearless fighter, master the art of spellcasting, or outsmart your enemies as a cunning assassin, there’s a champion for every playstyle. Dive into the lore behind each character and discover what makes them legends.

Champions

Stay Ahead of the Game

League of Legends constantly evolves with new patches, events, and balance updates to keep the game fresh. Stay informed with the latest champion reworks, exciting in-game events, and changes that shape the meta. Whether it's seasonal events or gameplay improvements, there’s always something new to explore and enjoy in the ever-changing world of League.

read more

item.title: Valorant
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
FPS

Tactical Shooter, Unmatched Precision

Valorant is a tactical 5v5 first-person shooter where precision, strategy, and skill determine the outcome of each round. Combining the excitement of gunplay with unique agent abilities, Valorant challenges players to outsmart and outgun their opponents in a fast-paced, competitive environment.

Game Page

Agents with Unique Abilities

Valorant’s diverse roster of agents offers distinct abilities that can turn the tide of any match. From creating barriers to scouting enemy positions, each agent brings a strategic twist to classic gunplay, allowing players to master different styles of play.

Tactical Gameplay

Valorant is more than just aiming—it's about planning, positioning, and outthinking your opponents. Use strategy and teamwork to secure bomb sites, execute well-timed attacks, or hold the line on defense, all while managing your economy and resources for the perfect buy.

Competitive Play

Climb the ranks in Valorant’s competitive mode, where each win brings you closer to the top. Test your skills against players worldwide, improve with every match, and earn your place in the ranks through precision, strategy, and teamwork.

Agents: Master the Game, Your Way

In Valorant, agents are more than just characters—they’re the key to crafting your playstyle. Each agent has a unique set of abilities, from healing allies to deploying surveillance drones. Master your favorites or adapt to any role, creating endless strategic possibilities for every match.

Agents

News & Updates: The Latest from the Frontlines

Stay up to date with Valorant’s constant evolution, from new agents and maps to game-changing updates. Be the first to know about the latest patch notes, seasonal events, and balance changes that shape the meta. With regular updates, Valorant keeps the competitive scene fresh and thrilling for both new and veteran players

read more

item.title: Teamfight Tactics
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
STRATEGY

A Strategic Auto-Battler

Teamfight Tactics (TFT) is a strategic auto-battler where you build a team of champions and battle against seven other players to become the last one standing. Combine champions, items, and formations to create powerful synergies and outthink your opponents in each round.

Game Page

Build Synergies

Mix and match champions to create powerful synergies and combos that enhance your team’s performance. Each champion belongs to different traits and origins, allowing endless possibilities for unique team compositions.

Adapt to Randomness

Every game in TFT is different. Adapt to changing circumstances with random champion selections, item drops, and ever-shifting opponents. Your ability to adapt and make smart decisions on the fly will be the key to victory.

Ranked Mode

Climb the ranks in TFT’s competitive ladder, testing your strategic skills against other players. Whether you’re aiming for the top or simply looking to improve, ranked play offers a challenge for every type of tactician.

Champions: Your Path to Victory

Champions are the core of your strategy in TFT. Choose wisely and position them strategically to maximize their potential. With every champion offering unique traits and abilities, mastering different combinations is essential for adapting to any situation and dominating the board.

sET OVERVIEW

News & Updates: New Sets, New Strategies

TFT is constantly evolving with new sets, champions, and mechanics that refresh the game experience. Stay updated with patch notes, balance changes, and the latest releases to keep your strategies sharp. Each update brings fresh challenges and opportunities to redefine your path to victory.

read more

item.title: LoL: Wild Rift
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
MOBILE MOBA

League of Legends On the Go

Wild Rift is the mobile version of League of Legends, bringing the fast-paced MOBA experience to your fingertips. With shorter match times, optimized controls, and the same beloved champions, Wild Rift is perfect for players who want to dive into the action anytime, anywhere.

Game Page

Mobile-Optimized Gameplay

Wild Rift is designed specifically for mobile devices, with intuitive touch controls and shorter match times. Whether you're a veteran or new to MOBAs, Wild Rift offers a smooth and action-packed experience without compromising on depth.

Classic Champions, New Strategies

Play as your favorite champions from League of Legends, now reimagined for mobile. Each champion retains their iconic abilities, but new strategies arise as you adapt to Wild Rift’s unique pacing and controls.

Competitive Matches on the Go

Climb the ranks, participate in events, and test your skills against players worldwide. Wild Rift’s competitive ladder lets you experience the thrill of ranked matches from wherever you are, making every game an opportunity to improve.

Champions: Mobile Legends at Your Fingertips

Just like in League of Legends, champions are the heart of Wild Rift. With a growing roster of powerful characters, players can enjoy their favorites and experiment with new picks on a mobile platform. Whether you prefer damage, support, or tank roles, every champion is optimized for mobile play, offering a fresh yet familiar experience.

CHAMPIONS

News & Updates: Fresh Content for Every Patch

Wild Rift is always evolving with new champions, events, and updates to keep the game exciting. Stay tuned for regular patch notes, balance changes, and seasonal events that introduce new content and fresh challenges. Whether it's limited-time modes or champion updates, there's always something new in Wild Rift.

read more

item.title: Legends of Runeterra
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
TRADING CARD STRATEGY

Master the Art of Card Strategy

Legends of Runeterra is a strategic card game set in the League of Legends universe. Build powerful decks using champions, spells, and allies from different regions of Runeterra. Outsmart your opponents with careful planning and quick decision-making in this ever-evolving card battler.

Game Page

Dynamic Deck Building

Choose your champions and craft a deck around their strengths. With a wide variety of cards from different regions, Legends of Runeterra offers countless combinations to suit your playstyle, whether you prefer aggressive attacks or strategic control.

Skill-Based Gameplay

Legends of Runeterra rewards skill and strategy over luck. With mechanics that allow you to react to your opponent’s moves in real-time, every decision matters. Success comes from careful planning and predicting your opponent’s next step.

Constant Updates and Expansions

The game is regularly updated with new cards, regions, and mechanics, keeping the meta fresh and exciting. Adapt your decks to new strategies and discover creative ways to stay ahead of the competition.

Competitive Scene: Climb the Ranks and Prove Your Skill

Legends of Runeterra offers a thriving competitive scene where players can test their skills and strategy against the best. Whether you’re climbing the ranked ladder or participating in seasonal tournaments, the game rewards those who master its deep mechanics and strategic play. Show your prowess in intense matches and rise through the ranks to prove you’re one of Runeterra’s finest tacticians.

COMPETITIVE

News & Updates: Expanding the World of Runeterra

Legends of Runeterra constantly evolves with new expansions, game modes, and balance updates. Stay on top of the latest patch notes, discover new strategies with each card release, and experience limited-time events that bring exciting changes to the game. There's always something new to explore in the world of Runeterra.

read more

item.title: A. Dylan Jadeja
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
Chief executive officer

A. Dylan Jadeja

The Executive_

A. Dylan Jadeja is the CEO of Riot Games, having been with the company since 2011. Known for his strategic leadership and deep commitment to the company’s mission, Dylan has played a pivotal role in Riot’s growth and its focus on delivering player-first experiences. Before becoming CEO, Dylan served as CFO and later President, where he was instrumental in shaping the company’s financial and operational direction. Under his leadership, Riot continues to innovate and expand, driving forward its vision of creating the most player-focused gaming experiences globally.

item.title: Brandon
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
Co-founder & co-chairman

Brandon Beck

The Chairman_

Brandon Beck is the co-founder of Riot Games and one of the creative minds behind League of Legends. Along with Marc Merrill, he founded Riot Games in 2006 with the mission of creating player-focused games. As CEO until 2017, Brandon guided the company through the development and global success of League of Legends, making Riot a leader in the gaming industry. His passion for fostering community and creating immersive, competitive experiences remains a core influence at Riot as the company continues to innovate and expand into new areas of gaming and entertainment.

item.title: Marc
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
Co-founder and chief product officer

Marc Merrill

The Product_

Marc Merrill is the co-founder of Riot Games and a key visionary behind League of Legends. Along with Brandon Beck, Marc founded Riot Games in 2006 with a player-first philosophy that revolutionized the gaming industry. As a former CEO and now President of Games, Marc continues to drive Riot's creative direction and development of new games, ensuring the company's commitment to player-focused experiences. His passion for competitive gaming and building a global community has been instrumental in shaping Riot's growth and success, making it a household name in the world of gaming.

item.title: Emily
item.dc:creator: wp90541148179
item.content:encoded:
Chief people officer

Emily Winkle

The People_

Emily Winkle is the Chief People Officer at Riot Games, where she leads the company’s people operations and talent strategies. Joining Riot in 2019, Emily has been instrumental in shaping the company’s culture, ensuring it remains player-focused while fostering an inclusive and dynamic workplace. With a background in human resources and leadership development, she is passionate about empowering teams and driving Riot’s mission through its most important asset—its people. Under her leadership, Riot continues to prioritize diversity, growth, and the well-being of its employees.
